thread.section_title: BenQ Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BenQ Direct | benqdirect.com
thread.title: Adam Wise
thread.title_full: BenQ Direct reviewed by Adam Wise

author: Adam Wise
title: Adam Wise
text:
I've had the monitor for about a month now. It's my first purchase from BenQ. The only hiccup I had was that I'd need to be home to sign for it. As a result, I needed to pickup the monitor from FedEx since I wouldn't be available, though if I were in BenQ's position I completely understand needing someone to physically receive it.
The features of the monitor are great, the quality is the best I've had in a monitor to this point, and it's allowed me to have both a better home work space and gaming space. My only possible regret is not having bought a 2nd.
